messages.subject: New Websites
messages.msgSnippet: Guys check out the new oriental art website exploited by the largest Asian art Dealer in The Netherlands  www.pranger-oriental.com There is also a tsuba
messages.messageBody:
Guys check out the new oriental art website exploited by the largest
Asian art Dealer in The Netherlands www.pranger-oriental.com

There is also a tsuba section under "Japanese Art".

Futhermore this dealer has also opened a new online Book store dealing
in Oriental Art related Books. Find it here www.orientalartbooks.com

Enjoy !

Matthew



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
